Package: fr.echoes.gradle.plugins.cpp.extensions

[Groovy] Class CppExecExtension

    • fr.echoes.gradle.plugins.cpp.extensions.CppExecExtension

    • This class set the configurations of all tasks of type CppExecTask.

      In addition of basic properties, dynamically, some others properties are added. For each task of type CppExecTask, these properties are addes :

      • ${task.name}ExecPath : command path te execute for this task
      • ${task.name}BaseArgs : arguments of the command of this task
      • ${task.name}Args : more arguments for the command of this task
      • ${task.name}StandardOutput : output of type java.io.OutputStream for the command of this task
      • ${task.name}ExecPath : location to execute the command for this task

      Usage example 

          cpp.exec.with{

    }

      Created by jguidoux on 01/10/15.

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          java.util.Map<java.lang.String, ?>  env
          Set the environment variable for the command execution for each task of type CppExecTask
          java.lang.Object  execPath
          The default command path to execute for each task of type CppExecTask if they don't override it with the property ${task.name}ExecPath}

      • Property Detail

        • java.util.Map<java.lang.String, ?> env

          Set the environment variable for the command execution for each task of type CppExecTask

          Usage example 

              cpp.exec.with{
        env = [JAVA_HOME: "/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-oracle"]
    }

        • java.lang.Object execPath

          The default command path to execute for each task of type CppExecTask if they don't override it with the property ${task.name}ExecPath}

          Usage example 

              cpp.exec.with{
        execPath = "make"
    }
